hints.content: Start by understanding the structure of the input arrays. You have two arrays for land rides and two for water rides. Each ride has a start time and a duration, which you will need to calculate the finish time.
Consider the two possible sequences for the rides: land ride first followed by water ride, and water ride first followed by land ride. You will need to compute the finish time for both sequences.

When calculating the finish time for a ride, remember that a ride can only start at its opening time or later. Use the maximum of the current time and the ride's start time to determine when the ride can actually begin.

For the first sequence (land ride first), the finish time can be calculated as follows: 
1. Start the land ride at its earliest possible time. 
2. Calculate the finish time of the land ride. 
3. Use this finish time to determine when you can start the water ride.

Similarly, for the second sequence (water ride first), calculate the finish time by starting the water ride at its earliest possible time, then determine when you can start the land ride based on when the water ride finishes.
Make sure to check the constraints carefully. You need to handle cases where the rides have overlapping times or when one ride finishes before the other starts.
You may want to store the finish times from both sequences and then return the minimum of these times. This will ensure you find the earliest possible finish time.
Consider edge cases, such as when there is only one ride in each category. Make sure your logic handles these cases correctly without errors.
Use a loop to iterate through all land rides and water rides to compute the finish times for both sequences. You will need nested loops for this, as you will check every combination of rides.
Finally, ensure that your solution runs efficiently given the constraints (up to 50,000 rides in each category). Think about the time complexity of your approach and how to optimize it if necessary.

questionNotes: The tourist must experience exactly one ride from each category.
Rides can be started at their opening time or later.
